entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023
